title: OCE Draft Pick
body:
Hey, I have noticed that OCE doesn't have a draft pick mode for normals, but it desperately needs it. It's difficult to practice for rank if you can't get your two preferred positions half the time, not to mention the arguments and anger that the calling positions in chat system can cause. I think it would really help the quality of life of the game if OCE was able to choose between blind pick or draft pick. A lot of other countries do, so why not OCE? Thankyou for reading.

Thoughts anyone? 

Rito pls <3

replies.body:
We probably can't sustain teh queue.  Out of peak hours its hard enough to get a game of flex.

Flex queue currently seems to serve that need for most people...I suggest you try it out if you dont already use it for something more serious, like playing with a team.

Wouldn't mind seeing it replace blind pick though.  Get new players used to it, and stop the instalock trolling.

the people saying things like there isnt people to make the q times good, well I know alot of people that play on different servers and the main reason ebing because they want to play draft without playing in a ranked gamemode because they hate blind pick. main reasons being because of meta and counter picks, I think it is needed to make the server fun to play because atm its just toxic.
Simple fact is we don't have the population to support both blind and draft normals.

so remove blind.

Honestly 1/2 the reason i hate playing normals is specifically because I cannot ban things.

So many of the normals I play are miserable because I pick something that I just want to learn, but am forced against hard counters and/or super-meta picks.
Then your have to wait going to pick and ban which can take some time. And I honestly can't always be bothered to have to wait am extra 5/10 minutes to get in game and that's if someone doesn't dodge
All it will do is have people complain about autofill and long queue times for their norms
